title: Chloe Sims suffers an unfortunate wardrobe malfunction as plunging top slips to reveal her assets
text:
She's no stranger to rocking a dramatic look.

And Chloe Sims' statement style left her with an unfortunate wardrobe malfunction on Saturday night after her top slipped to reveal her assets.

The TOWIE star, 36, spilled out of her plunging draped top as she arrived at Cirque nightclub in Manchester with pal Pete Wicks.

Slip: Chloe Sims' statement style left her with an unfortunate wardrobe malfunction on Saturday night after her top slipped to reveal her assets

Night out: The TOWIE star, 36, spilled out of her plunging draped top as she arrived at Cirque nightclub in Manchester with pal Pete Wicks

Chloe cut a fashionable figure in tight fitting leather trousers and the swooping top as she posed for pictures at the club.

The reality star accessorised her look with several gold chain necklaces, a matching belt and an anklet on her right foot.

She wore her blonde tresses down and curled and also added a touch of bright purple eye-shadow to her makeup.

Wardrobe malfunction: Chloe, who wore her blonde hair down for the night out, seemed unfazed by the slip

Oops: Pete Wicks was also out with Chloe and the pair appeared to be in good spirits

Friend and fellow TOWIE star Pete, 30, was also at the club in Manchester and looked sharp in a crisp white t-shirt, black trousers and brown shoes.

He gave a glimpse of his tattoos under his cool leather jacket and wore his trademark brunette locks down.

The TV favourite stood next to Chloe as she dealt with her wardrobe malfunction and held her long black coat out in front of her.

Pete and Amy are close friends with him previously admitting he feels incredibly protective towards Chloe and is pleased to see her date Pamela Anderson’s ex Adil.

The mother-of-one made headlines a few weeks ago when she was seen leaving London hotspot Chiltern Firehouse in the company of the dashing football star.

Throwing his support behind their unlikely romance, Pete told MailOnline: ‘I wasn’t surprised, I knew she was going on a date. I know she had a good time.

Accident: Chloe cut a fashionable figure in tight leather trousers and the draped top while Pete looked suave in a white t-shirt and leather jacket

'I think he lives in a different country so I don’t know when they’re planning on seeing each other again.’

Adil parted ways with Pamela this summer following her allegations of 'mental abuse' and accusations of violence and cheating - all of which he has strenuously denied.

Meanwhile, Chloe has had a tough year after her ill-fated romance with co-star Dan Edgar left her heartbroken when he went crawling back to his ex Amber Turner.

Feeling like a protective big brother, Pete said: ‘Chloe deserves to be happy and whatever makes her happy, I’m there for.

Pose: Chloe added some height to her frame by donning pointed heels with a clear strap

‘I am quite protective over Chloe, she has been messed around a bit and she deserves all the happiness in the world. Hopefully, one day she’ll find her prince charming!’

Chloe and Pete recently had a psychic reading after the blonde became convinced they were soulmates and discovered they had supposedly known each other in their past lives.

But in this lifetime, romance is off the cards – despite the pair looking very cosy during a boozy night out last week.

‘Right now me and Chloe are good friends and that’s the way we like it. If it’s not broke, don’t fix it’, Pete said.
